attributes.action: Refund Stamp duty on all house purchases from 01/03/20 up to a value of £500,000
attributes.additional_details:
Financial strain during the pandemic 

Those purchasing houses during the pandemic have also suffered financially due to the pandemic 

Give those who have just purchased property additional income to boost the economy
attributes.background: Refund all stamp duty on property purchases during the pandemic from the 1st March 2020
